refsect2.title: Environment variables
refsect2.para: libgdata makes use of a few environment variables which affect how it runs, mainly with respect to debugging.

formalpara.para: If this environment variable is defined, libgdata will force the use of HTTP for requests which would otherwise normally use HTTPS. This allows the network traffic to be debugged more easily.

If this environment variable is set to one of the following values, libgdata will give debug output (at various levels). If it's unset, no debug output will be produced.
0
Output no debug messages or network logs.
1
Output debug messages, but not network logs.
2
Output debug messages and network traffic headers.
3
Output debug messages and full network traffic logs.
